blogData.heading: React js
blogData.content: Reactjs is the most popular frontend library used to create ui part of the single page web applications.

blogData.heading: Ramayana
blogData.content: Ramayana is a holy epic for Hindus and is revered all around the world by the followers of Shriram.

blogData.heading: Tom and Jerry
blogData.content: Tom and jerry is one of the most popular cartoon shows. These characters are introduced by Hanna and Barbera in the year 1940.

blogData.heading: Mahabharata
blogData.content: Mahabharat is a Hindu epic, and Its a story about victory of Dharma over Adharma or evilness. Main character of the story is ShriKrishna.
